definition: to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)
to be in charge of/to take responsibility for/to be to blame/conscientious
to be in debt/to incur debts/liability (finance)
victory or defeat/the outcome of a battle
to take responsibility/to bear responsibility/to be responsible
to shoulder (a burden)/to bear/to suffer (a disadvantage)
to bear/to carry on one's back/to shoulder
to fail to live up (to expectations)/unworthy (of trust)/to let down/to betray (hopes)/to disappoint
heavy load/heavy burden (also fig. of tax)

sentences.english: It is good for a man that he bear the yoke in his youth.
sentences.chinese: 人在幼年負軛，這原是好的。

sentences.english: This phenomenon appears even more striking in the simulation realization of non-linear negative impedance.
sentences.chinese: 這在非線性負阻抗的模擬實現中，更爲突出。

sentences.english: But the advertising revenue has declined for two consecutive quarters.
sentences.chinese: 但是，連續二季的廣告收入出現負成長，出現隱憂。

sentences.english: O neg and fresh frozen on the way?
sentences.chinese: 負O型血和新鮮冷凍血漿到了嗎？

sentences.english: The ruin probabilities in the compound binomial risk model;
sentences.chinese: 考慮了複合負二項風險模型下的破產概率。

sentences.english: For the entrusted sample tests , the technical responsibilities are undertaken for the delivered samples and the corresponding applied technical standards only.
sentences.chinese: 送樣委託檢驗，僅對來樣和所執行的標準負技術責任。

sentences.english: In this paper, thermodynamics of irreversible processes at negative absolute temperatures is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論負絕對溫度下的不可逆過程熱力學。

sentences.english: Methods By using the negative high voltage exhaled thoron progeny measurement system.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用負高壓呼出氣中子體測定裝置。

sentences.english: Has primary responsibility for the design and development of an instructionally sound product.
sentences.chinese: 對設計和開發負主要責任，以保證產品的教學有效性。

sentences.english: When you’re married, you’re liable to have babies, you know.
sentences.chinese: 當你們結婚，你就要對孩子負法律責任，你知道嗎？

sentences.english: Superluminal motion corresponds with negative mass and negative energy.
sentences.chinese: 超光速運動對應負質量和負能量。

sentences.english: Linear search in the negative gradient direction was also applied to accelerate the optimization.
sentences.chinese: 引入負梯度方向直線搜索來加速算法尋優。

sentences.english: It shows that negative chirp can improve the dispersion characteristics of system.
sentences.chinese: 分析結果表明，利用負啁啾可以改善系統的色散特性。

sentences.english: The manufacturers disclaim all responsibility for damage caused by mistake.
sentences.chinese: 製造商不承認對使用不當而造成的損壞負任何責任。

sentences.english: Climate change is the mother of all negative externalities.
sentences.chinese: 氣候變化正是所有負外部性的源頭。

sentences.english: The mechanism of utilizing negative activators to passivate gasification reaction of coke is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析和研究了利用負催化劑鈍化焦炭氣化反應的機理。

definition: victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
to fit one into the other/to bring two things into contact
picul (100 catties, 50 kg)/two buckets full/carrying pole and its load/classifier for loads carried on a shoulder pole
to undertake/to carry/to shoulder/to take responsibility
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
